Good grief!  Blind and stupid!
DL the PATCH and patch the ORIGINAL game files, THEN copy the crack to the obvious location.  If you can't figure out the obvious location then you really shouldn't be allowed in public unsupervised.

People you shouldn't get any mistakes! You make a fresh install of HW 2 1.0 and patch it to 1.1 with clean patch and simply copy this exe in HW2\bin\release folder and replace the original file. It's good to always make a backup ;)! Maybe the crack works only for English version only but I am not sure! Please use english versions only to be sure.

About the luaconfig.dll error it seems you are placing the 1.1 crack on a 1.0 version. It must be updated before applying the crack! Also ROnneth I think you need to run the game in compatibility mode for Windows XP.
